thread.section_title: Lumley's Place - UPDATED 2017 Guest house Reviews & Price Comparison (Pniel, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Home away from home
thread.title_full: Home away from home - Review of Lumley's Place, Pniel, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Dene C
title: Home away from home
text:
Going to a Wedding in the Stellenbosch area? or simply passing through? This is the place to stay.
What a gem! We had a short but truly wonderful stay. The rooms are beautifully clean and exquisite, and the morning breakfasts are something to boast about! From a friendly conversation with the owner to delicious coffee, fresh-out-the-oven baked goods, fruits, cereal, hot plate eggs and bacon...you name it!
The owners take pride in treating their guests like family and it is immediately felt. Thank you to all the friendly staff as well for going the extra mile, superb service! A must for any Stellenbosch travel!
